lines.text: Go west, young man, go west! I bet the guy who said that ain't been west of Ho Bokin!
[Looks around]
Not a living thing in sight! Nothing but that... Tree!
[Jumps on the branch and dons a napkin]
At last - a square meal!
[Starts pecking]
Petrified!
That Shorty Snorter's the best rock breaker we've ever had here!

[On finding Shorty in the horse trough]
It's getting so a horse can't get a clean drink around here!
[Leaves just as Woody enters]
Do you want a gun fight, or are you going to spend all day playing in the water?

[Banging on the door of the state prison]
Let me in! Let me in!
Er... What's the password?
The Ghost!
That's the password!
Just keep right on walking, woodpecker - I'll tell you when to stop.
[Woody keeps walking, and drops off a cliff]
He's dead! I got my re-venge!

[Walking in behind Shorty]
Hey! When are you going to tell me to stop?

[Backing away]
No! No! Don't come any closer - you're a ghost!
Booo!
